# PED::GET_PED_GROUP_INDEX

## Summary
Get the group index form the ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **GROUP_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the group id of which the specified ped is a member of.
